ygData.subject: Re: Seeking advice...
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe I missed it but, where were you ?   One of the planes?
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe I missed it but, where were you ? One of the planes?


On Fri, 14 Jan 2000, Rose wrote:

> From: "Rose" <rliu@...>
>
> Just an update on how it went last night from the newbie lvl 50 cleric ;)
>
> Well, I only died once and none of the tanks died. The group was consisting
> of 3 tanks and 2 clerics. We had some good fighting/pulling and basically
> it was a good raid. I was unsure, and still is, on what my role as the
> "other" cleric is. The more experienced cleric in the group was rather
> uncommunicative. I basically buffed and kept the buffing on all the tanks,
> and the clerics. I cast out SH when I saw health going down drastically and
> GH once in awhile. I did cast Naltron on all the tanks though...wasted alot
> of money =/ I had like 20 peridot now Im down to 5
>
>
> Can anyone tell me if u use atone on any of these raids? If so, just how do
> u go about using it? I mean do you heal, atone, heal, atone...just so that
> the thing won't frenzy on you?
>
> Thanks again for all the helpful tips and advice =)
>
>
